page.title: 11MARY ELTON PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: {MARY ELTON SCHOOL }was built in I982 for the children moving to the new estates around the {West End of {Clevedon,}named after a Victorian ,Clevedonian educational benefactress. {Mr.Knox-Little}is the head teacher.His busiest day is Monday because he has to do the office work.He was a head teacher in Somerset before. {Mrs Purnell}is the caretaker.She did not have any intention of being the caretaker before her children started at the school.The untidiest parts of the school are the junior department and the boys toilets. {Mrs Kelly}is the cook.Every day shee cooks about 210 dinners.Her hardest job is writing the menu and trying to work out what everyone wants and to give variety and protein. Next year the school will have two more classrooms in huts.
